Metadata: Oregon's Tasty Mussels: Recipes, Handling and Harvesting Tips
Staff in the Department of Nutrition and Food Management at Oregon State University

Mussels are found in all the oceans of the world and have been a favorite seafood of many people for centuries. This flier offers eleven tasty recipes as well as information on harvesting wild mussels and food safety. The flier explains how to steam, bake, and fry mussels and includes recipes for BBQ mussels, mussels with linguini, and mussel bisque.
